content.body:
> <@jridgewell:matrix.org> Chris de Almeida: Can you give us edit permissions on the cal invite, or can you add my Google email (jridgewell@google…)

do you mean 'modify event' checkbox under guest permissions?

In reply to @jridgewell:matrix.org
Chris de Almeida: Can you give us edit permissions on the cal invite, or can you add my Google email (jridgewell@google…)
do you mean 'modify event' checkbox under guest permissions?
